quest.name: So You Want to Be a Thaumaturge

dialogue.name: YAYAKE
dialogue.text: Welcome to the Thaumaturges' Guild. It is fate that has guided your steps here, friend.

dialogue.name: YAYAKE
dialogue.text: Within these hallowed halls, the arts of devastation are taught─primeval magicks with which to bring about an enemy's ruin.

dialogue.name: YAYAKE
dialogue.text: If you would join our ranks and wield the power of thaumaturgy, I urge you to seize this moment and confide in me your arcane ambitions.

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: Do you wish to join the Thaumaturges' Guild?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Yes

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: No

dialogue.name: YAYAKE
dialogue.text: Your denial is most unsettling!

dialogue.name: YAYAKE
dialogue.text: Ah, but I see the stars were not yet aligned. Your time will come, and I shall be waiting.

dialogue.name: YAYAKE
dialogue.text: ...I fear my words of destiny and desire were spoken in haste. Your aura bespeaks a certain...unpreparedness, as if your spirit is reluctant to abandon a path yet freshly begun.

dialogue.name: YAYAKE
dialogue.text: Pray continue down that path until a fork presents itself. Perhaps the choice you then make shall lead you back to the gates of thaumaturgy.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Before you can take up another discipline, you must first complete the level 10 quest of your starting class.

dialogue.name: YAYAKE
dialogue.text: Yes. There truly was no other answer, was there? Lean closer now, and I shall whisper to you of thaumaturgy's beginnings.

dialogue.name: YAYAKE
dialogue.text: The nation of Ul'dah inherited its traditions from ancient Belah'dia, a city founded by the descendants of the first mages.

dialogue.name: YAYAKE
dialogue.text: The secrets of these illustrious sorcerers were ultimately entrusted to the priests of the Order of Nald'thal, who have passed them down from generation to generation ever since.

dialogue.name: YAYAKE
dialogue.text: Focused and refined over centuries of use in the Order's funereal rites, the arcane magicks of our ancestors eventually emerged as the art we now know as thaumaturgy.

dialogue.name: YAYAKE
dialogue.text: A freezing blizzard to halt corruption; a raging fire to cleanse the corpse; a bolt of lightning to expel the sins of mortal life... The dweomers employed in the preparation of the dead are equally efficacious when applied to the living.

dialogue.name: YAYAKE
dialogue.text: Thus does our guild thrive in the depths of Arrzaneth Ossuary─a sanctuary devoted to Thal, the divine arbiter of the afterlife.

dialogue.name: YAYAKE
dialogue.text: What say you, then, adventurer? If you would plumb the abyssal depths of thaumaturgy, let our learned sages guide your descent!

dialogue.name: YAYAKE
dialogue.text: Ah, but before you leap into the darkness, you must prove to our guildmasters that you are possessed of the spiritual fortitude necessary to look upon that which waits therein.

dialogue.name: YAYAKE
dialogue.text: When you are ready to submit to the judgment of our most eminent mages, say the word.
